https://lihkg.com/thread/1986562/page/15
If you have antibody, then it suggests that you have already infected and your body has the antibody to kill the virus. So you have immunity. Therefore you can go back to work as normal.

Hence, some governments now use the antibody to screen people who have antibody. Some people try to get infected so that they can have the antibody, then they do not need to stay-at-home.

In New York, over 13% of people have been tested to have antibody yesterday. Because of the antibody test, the countries can also make a lot more of tests everyday, so the number of new cases has been increased quite a lot. In New York State, the situation is improving but the number of new cases are have been increasing because of this new tests.
